subject: New ACH exceptions to review
body:
Dear {{{user.preferredName}}} {{{user.familyName}}},

You have new ACH exceptions to review before the cut-off time on {{{event.cutOffTime}}}. If you do not review them before this cut-off time, they will be {{#eq event.defaultDecision 'PAY' }}paid{{else}}rejected{{/eq}}.

To review your exceptions:
	* Log in to Backbase
	* Go to ACH Positive Pay
	* Click Exceptions-Active

If you have any questions about this email, please contact [contact details].


Regards,
[Responsible Dept name]
